thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com
thread.title: Guy

author: Guy
title: Guy
text: Their prices were not the lowest I found, but were within just a couple dollars of the lowest. $60 for shipping on a total of (16) 4' single florescent lamp fixtures was a little steep, too. $15 more than the place with the lower price on the product. I placed two orders separately to get two Amazon gift cards ($40 total) to make it worth it. I actually ended up paying about $10 more ordering from 1000Bulbs.com, only because I wasn't familiar with the other online retailer.
